items.title: Fight Club
items.overview: A ticking-Loss-Loss disillusioned corporate worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

items.title: Pulp Fiction
items.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer turns to manufacturing meth to secure his family's future.

items.title: The Boys
items.overview: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
